title: OpenShift Outage
scenario: We are advised that due to a major incident, the OpenShift Production and NPE Clusters will be out for a period of 2 days.

title: AWOL Case Officer
scenario: A case officer, after a lifetime of service, finally lost it and went through all active applications and rejected them before throwing their laptop out a window and leaving the building.

title: Doc Upload Failure
scenario: You recieve a call to the call center that "Document Upload is Failing please come back later."

title: Win The Lottery
scenario: The Support Team put together a lotto pool and surprise they won $49 million dollars. We all quit our jobs and retire to a life of luxury.

title: NZ Post Outage
scenario: NZ Post API is not responding and applications are being received with incomplete addresses.

title: Register DB Patching
scenario: Our Partner advises that the Register's Database servers are going to be migrated and will be unavailable for two days.

title: Service Account Expiration
scenario: Multiple services are reporting failures to accessing Azure KeyVault.

title: EI/iDAL Integration issues
scenario: iDAL Payloads are not showing up in the drop zone. The API is showing that the payload has successfully been uploaded.
